timeline.bodyText: All these English names of the instruments (down to line 693) should be in strings.xml so that they can be translated via CrowdIn on https://translate.catrobat.org/ by our translators.
timeline.author: wslany

timeline.bodyText: Same as discussed with @m-herold for normal instruments: please restrict it to the set from Scratch, in the same order.
timeline.author: wslany

timeline.bodyText:
Same as discussed with @m-herold for normal instruments: please make a token based serialization, something like:
<brick type="SetInstrumentBrick">
  <commentedOut>false</commentedOut>
  <drumSelection>TRIANGLE</instrumentSelection>
</brick>

and so on.
